mapper.select: SELECT U.USER_ID, U.ENTER_DT FROM USER_INFO U LEFT JOIN HOLIDAY_INFO H ON U.USER_ID = H.USER_ID WHERE U.USE_YN LIKE 'Y' AND H.USE_START IS NULL
